title: LF DUO SILVER 3
body:
IGN: Bubbielift
Currently Silver 3, trying to push out of silver with some help and good communication.
Requirements:
18+ Preferably
Decent Mic, No BG noise/I Don't want to hear your keyboard when we play
Discord
I main Marksman and Mid lane, Looking for a support or jungler preferably but will take a top lane main.
Thanks, leave a comment or message me in game :)

replies.body: i main sup/top/mid in that order, i added you

I main support add me :)
Always looking for good ADC's
